Package com.ibm.security.verifysdk

Class TotpGeneratorContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.security.verifysdk.OtpGeneratorContext
      • com.ibm.security.verifysdk.TotpGeneratorContext
  • @RequiresApi(23)
public final class TotpGeneratorContext
extends OtpGeneratorContext
    Implementation to calculate a time-based one-time password according to https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6238
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Version:
    2.1.5

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.ibm.security.verifysdk.OtpGeneratorContext

        algorithm, counter, digits, secret

      Creates a new TotpGeneratorContext instance with the given parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String create()
      Returns a time-based one-time password for the current time of the system
      java.lang.String create​(int period)
      Returns a time-based one-time password based on T0 (Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC), the current time and the given period in seconds.
      java.lang.String create​(long timeInMillis)
      Returns a time-based one-time password based on T0 (Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC), the given UTC time in milliseconds and the period period set for this instance.
      static int remainingTime​(int period)
      Calculates the remaining time for a given period in seconds, based on T0 (GMT: Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT)

    • Constructor Detail

      • TotpGeneratorContext

        public TotpGeneratorContext​(@NonNull
                            java.lang.String secret,
                            int digits,
                            @NonNull
                            HmacAlgorithm algorithm)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new TotpGeneratorContext instance with the values secret, digits and algorithm. Initialization returns null if digits length is invalid outside the range
        Parameters:
        secret - the secret key used to generate the password.
        digits - a value of 6 or 8 representing the length of the password to be generated.
        algorithm - the HmacAlgorithm used to generate the password. The default is HmacAlgorithmSHA1.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or out of boundaries.

      • TotpGeneratorContext

        public TotpGeneratorContext​(@NonNull
                            java.lang.String secret,
                            int digits,
                            @NonNull
                            HmacAlgorithm algorithm,
                            int period)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new TotpGeneratorContext instance with the given parameters. Initialization returns null if digits length is invalid or period is outside the range.
        Parameters:
        secret - the secret key used to generate the password.
        digits - a value of 6 or 8 representing the length of the password to be generated. The default is 6.
        algorithm - the HmacAlgorithm used to generate the password. The default is HmacAlgorithmSHA1.
        period - a value between 1 and 300 representing the number of seconds the password is valid. Default is 30.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or out of boundaries.

    • Method Detail

      • remainingTime

        public static int remainingTime​(int period)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Calculates the remaining time for a given period in seconds, based on T0 (GMT: Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT)
        Parameters:
        period - the period in seconds where the remaining time is needed, has to be > 0
        Returns:
        the remaining time in seconds
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is ≤ 0

      • create

        public java.lang.String create()
        Returns a time-based one-time password for the current time of the system
        Overrides:
        create in class OtpGeneratorContext
        Returns:
        • the generated one-time password value
        • null if the OTP could not be created

      • create

        public java.lang.String create​(int period)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a time-based one-time password based on T0 (Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC), the current time and the given period in seconds.

        Ensure that the parameter has the correct type (int). Otherwise create(long) will be called.

        Parameters:
        period - represents the period in seconds, has to be ≥ 1 and ≤ 300
        Returns:
        • the generated one-time password value
        • null if the OTP could not be created
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if timeInterval is < 1 or > 300

      • create

        public java.lang.String create​(long timeInMillis)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a time-based one-time password based on T0 (Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC), the given UTC time in milliseconds and the period period set for this instance.

        Ensure that the parameter has the correct type (long). Otherwise create(int) will be called.

        Overrides:
        create in class OtpGeneratorContext
        Parameters:
        timeInMillis - the UTC time to generate the one-time password in milliseconds
        Returns:
        • the generated one-time password value
        • null if the OTP could not be created
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
